headline.main: GOP Official Apologizes for Writing Atop Benton Painting
headline.print_headline: GOP Official Apologizes for Writing Atop Benton Painting

docs.snippet: The vice chairwoman of the Missouri Republican Party has apologized for using a Thomas Hart Benton mural as a writing surface in the state Capitol....
docs.lead_paragraph: The vice chairwoman of the Missouri Republican Party has apologized for using a Thomas Hart Benton mural as a writing surface in the state Capitol.

headline.main: Hispanic Protesters Heckle Jeb Bush in Houston
headline.print_headline: Hispanic Protesters Heckle Jeb Bush in Houston

docs.snippet: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush pushed back against more than a dozen protesters who repeatedly heckled him Monday with chants of "No hope without our vote" as he tried to address a national Hispanic business group....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush pushed back against more than a dozen protesters who repeatedly heckled him Monday with chants of "No hope without our vote" as he tried to address a national Hispanic business group.

headline.main: Newseum Displays Freedom Slogans in Chinese During Xi Visit
headline.print_headline: Newseum Displays Freedom Slogans in Chinese During Xi Visit

docs.lead_paragraph: Washington's popular museum about news media is preparing an eye-catching welcome for Chinese President Xi Jinping's high-profile state visit this week: large banners calling for his authoritarian government to respect human rights and press freedom.

headline.main: Thailand Officials Relocate Mischievous Macaque Monkeys
headline.print_headline: Thailand Officials Relocate Mischievous Macaque Monkeys

docs.lead_paragraph: BANGKOK - About 80 long-tailed, mischievous, long-tailed macaque monkeys will be relocated from a community outside Thailand’s capital and  released into the wild and preservation areas.

headline.main: Baylor Assistant on Sideline During Oklahoma Game vs. Tulsa
headline.print_headline: Baylor Assistant on Sideline During Oklahoma Game vs. Tulsa

docs.snippet: Baylor coach Art Briles said Monday he was embarrassed to find out that one of his assistant coaches was on the sideline during an Oklahoma home game, the second potential NCAA rules violation by his staff to be disclosed in as many weeks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Baylor coach Art Briles said Monday he was embarrassed to find out that one of his assistant coaches was on the sideline during an Oklahoma home game, the second potential NCAA rules violation by his staff to be disclosed in as many weeks.
